title: Rainy city driving with moderate braking
caption: A red car drives slowly on a rainy city street with moderate braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.6 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a rainy city street. There are several other cars on the road, including a blue car and a black car. The road is wet and visibility is reduced due to the rain. There are traffic lights and street signs visible in the background.
reasoning: The red car is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It brakes frequently to avoid potential accidents and to give way to other vehicles on the road. The driver of the red car is being cautious and following traffic rules to ensure a safe journey.
